title: tvOS 15.5, watchOS 8.6, and HomePod Software 15.5 now available to the public
content:
Following the release of iOS 15.5 and macOS Monterey 12.4 to all users, Apple on Monday also made tvOS 15.5, watchOS 8.6, and HomePod Software 15.5 available to the public. The updates bring overall improvements with no major changes.

moreâ€¦

The post tvOS 15.5, watchOS 8.6, and HomePod Software 15.5 now available to the public appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: On Monday, Apple also made tvOS 15.5, watchOS 8.6, and HomePod Software 15.5 updates available to the public.
